trans-unit.source: The SqlDependency object represents a query notification dependency between an application and an instance of SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: SqlDependency 物件表示應用程式與 SQL Server 執行個體之間的查詢通知相依性。

trans-unit.source: An application can create a SqlDependency object and register to receive notifications via the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.OnChangeEventHandler"></xref> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式可以建立 SqlDependency 物件和註冊可以收到通知，透過<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.OnChangeEventHandler"></xref>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: SqlDependency is ideal for caching scenarios, where your ASP.NET application or middle-tier service needs to keep certain information cached in memory.
trans-unit.target: SqlDependency 非常適用於快取的案例，亦即您的 ASP.NET 應用程式或中介層服務需要保留在記憶體中快取的特定資訊。

trans-unit.source: SqlDependency allows you to receive notifications when the original data in the database changes so that the cache can be refreshed.
trans-unit.target: SqlDependency 可讓您在資料庫中的原始資料變更，因此可以重新整理快取時收到通知。

trans-unit.source: To set up a dependency, you need to associate a SqlDependency object to one or more <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> objects.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定相依性時，您必須建立一或多個 SqlDependency 物件關聯<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>物件。</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>

trans-unit.source: To receive notifications, you need to subscribe to the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.OnChange> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要接收通知，您必須訂閱<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.OnChange>事件。</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.OnChange>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the requirements for creating queries for notifications, see "Creating a Query for Notification" in SQL Server Books Online.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關建立查詢通知需求的詳細資訊，請參閱 「 建立查詢的通知 」 SQL Server 線上叢書 》 中。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > SqlDependency was designed to be used in ASP.NET or middle-tier services where there is a relatively small number of servers having dependencies active against the database.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > SqlDependency 已設計為使用 ASP.NET 或中介層服務中沒有相對小量的伺服器中針對資料庫使用中的相依性。

trans-unit.source: It was not designed for use in client applications, where hundreds or thousands of client computers would have SqlDependency objects set up for a single database server.
trans-unit.target: 它的設計無法用於用戶端應用程式，數百或數千個用戶端電腦會有單一資料庫伺服器設定的 SqlDependency 物件。

trans-unit.source: If you are developing an application where you need reliable sub-second notifications when data changes, review the sections **Planning an Efficient Query Notifications Strategy** and **Alternatives to Query Notifications** in the [Planning for Notifications](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=211984) topic in SQL Server Books Online.
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在開發應用程式的資料變更時，需要可靠的次秒通知，請檢閱各節**規劃有效率的查詢通知策略**和**查詢通知的替代方案**中[通知計畫](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=211984)SQL Server 線上叢書 》 中的主題。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Query Notifications in SQL Server](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and "Building Notification Solutions" in SQL Server Books Online.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[SQL Server 中的查詢通知](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和 SQL Server 線上叢書 》 中的 「 建置通知方案 」。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.OnChange> event may be generated on a different thread from the thread that initiated command execution.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.OnChange>起始命令執行的執行緒不同的執行緒上可能會產生事件。</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.OnChange>

trans-unit.source: Query notifications are supported only for SELECT statements that meet a list of specific requirements.
trans-unit.target: 查詢通知僅支援符合特定需求清單的 SELECT 陳述式。

trans-unit.source: The following table provides links to the Service Broker and Query Notifications documentation in SQL Server Books Online.
trans-unit.target: 下表將提供 SQL Server 線上叢書 》 中 Service Broker 和查詢通知文件的連結。

trans-unit.source: **SQL Server Books Online** - [Creating a Query for Notification](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms181122.aspx) - [Security Considerations for Service Broker](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms166059.aspx) - [Security and Protection (Service Broker)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb522911.aspx) - [Security Considerations for Notifications Services](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms172604.aspx) - [Query Notification Permissions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms188311.aspx) - [International Considerations for Service Broker](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms166028.aspx) - [Solution Design Considerations (Service Broker)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb522899.aspx) - [Service Broker Developer InfoCenter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms166100.aspx) - [Developer's Guide (Service Broker)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb522908.aspx)
trans-unit.target: **SQL Server 線上叢書** - [為通知建立查詢](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms181122.aspx) - [Service Broker 的安全性考量](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms166059.aspx) - [安全性與保護 (Service Broker)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb522911.aspx) - [通知服務的安全性考量](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms172604.aspx) - [查詢通知權限](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms188311.aspx) - [Service Broker 的國際性考量](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms166028.aspx) - [解決方案設計考量 (Service Broker)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb522899.aspx) - [Service Broker 開發人員資訊中心](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms166100.aspx) - [開發人員指南 (Service Broker)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb522908.aspx)

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"></xref> class with the default settings.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"></xref>類別的預設設定。

trans-unit.source: The constructor initializes the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> object using the default Service Broker service name and time-out.
trans-unit.target: 建構函式初始化<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>物件使用預設 Service Broker 服務名稱和逾時。</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>

trans-unit.source: At some point after construction, you must use the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.AddCommandDependency%2A> method to associate one or more commands to this <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> object.
trans-unit.target: 在某些時候建構完成之後，您必須使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.AddCommandDependency%2A>使一或多個命令，此方法<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>物件。</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.AddCommandDependency%2A>

trans-unit.source: Query notifications are supported only for SELECT statements that meet a list of specific requirements.
trans-unit.target: 查詢通知僅支援符合特定需求清單的 SELECT 陳述式。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"></xref> class and associates it with the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"></xref>類別，並將其與相關聯<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref>參數。

trans-unit.source: Internally, this constructor creates an instance of the <xref:System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest> class, and binds it to a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: 就內部而言，這個建構函式建立的執行個體<xref:System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest>類別，並繫結至<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>物件。</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> </xref:System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest>

trans-unit.source: Query notifications are supported only for SELECT statements that meet a list of specific requirements.
trans-unit.target: 查詢通知僅支援符合特定需求清單的 SELECT 陳述式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object to associate with this <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref>要產生關聯，與此物件<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The constructor will set up a <xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"></xref> object and bind it to the command.
trans-unit.target: 建構函式會設定<xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"></xref>物件，並將它繫結至命令。

trans-unit.source: The command parameter is NULL.
trans-unit.target: command 參數為 NULL。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object already has a <xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"></xref> object assigned to its <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Notification*> property, and that <xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"></xref> is not associated with this dependency.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref>物件已經有<xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"></xref>物件指派給其<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Notification*>屬性，且<xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"></xref>未與此相依性相關聯。</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Notification*>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"></xref> class, associates it with the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> parameter, and specifies notification options and a time-out value.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"></xref>類別中，將其與相關聯<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref>參數，並指定通知選項和逾時值。

trans-unit.source: Query notifications are supported only for SELECT statements that meet a list of specific requirements.
trans-unit.target: 查詢通知僅支援符合特定需求清單的 SELECT 陳述式。

trans-unit.target: 下表將提供 SQL Server 線上叢書 》 中 Service Broker 和查詢通知文件的連結。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object to associate with this <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref>要產生關聯，與此物件<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The constructor sets up a <xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"></xref> object and bind it to the command.
trans-unit.target: 建構函式會設定<xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"></xref>物件，並將它繫結至命令。

trans-unit.source: The notification request options to be used by this dependency.
trans-unit.target: 通知要求可供此相依性選項。

trans-unit.source: `null` to use the default service.
trans-unit.target: `null`若要使用預設的服務。

trans-unit.source: The time-out for this notification in seconds.
trans-unit.target: 此通知，以秒為單位的逾時。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0, indicating that the server's time-out should be used.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0，表示應該使用伺服器的逾時。

trans-unit.source: The command parameter is NULL.
trans-unit.target: command 參數為 NULL。

trans-unit.source: The time-out value is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 逾時值小於零。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object already has a <xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"></xref> object assigned to its <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Notification*> property and that <xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"></xref> is not associated with this dependency. An attempt was made to create a **SqlDependency** instance from within SQLCLR.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref>物件已經有<xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"></xref>物件指派給其<> *> 屬性且<xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"></xref>未與此相依性關聯。 嘗試建立* *SqlDependency** SQLCLR 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Associates a <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object with this <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 將<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref>物件與這個<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Query notifications are supported only for SELECT statements that meet a list of specific requirements.
trans-unit.target: 查詢通知僅支援符合特定需求清單的 SELECT 陳述式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object containing a statement that is valid for notifications.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref>物件，其中包含適用於通知的陳述式。

trans-unit.source: The command parameter is null.
trans-unit.target: command 參數為 null。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object already has a <xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"></xref> object assigned to its <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Notification*> property, and that <xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"></xref> is not associated with this dependency.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref>物件已經有<xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"></xref>物件指派給其<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Notification*>屬性，且<xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"></xref>未與此相依性相關聯。</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Notification*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether one of the result sets associated with the dependency has changed.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否已經變更其中一個結果集相關聯的相依性。

trans-unit.source: If you are not using the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.OnChange> event, you can check the HasChanges property to determine if the query results have changed.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.OnChange>事件，您可以檢查 HasChanges 屬性，以判斷查詢結果是否已經變更。</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.OnChange>

trans-unit.source: The HasChanges property does not necessarily imply a change in the data.
trans-unit.target: HasChanges 屬性不一定表示會在資料中的變更。

trans-unit.source: Other circumstances, such as time-out expired and failure to set the notification request, also generate a change event.
trans-unit.target: 其他情況下，例如逾時過期，而且無法設定通知要求，也會產生變更事件。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating whether one of the result sets has changed.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指出是否結果的其中一個設定已變更。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that uniquely identifies this instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值可唯一識別此執行個體<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The Id property is used to uniquely identify a given <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> instance.
trans-unit.target: Id 屬性用來唯一識別指定<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>執行個體。</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>

trans-unit.source: A string representation of a GUID that is generated for each instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 針對每個執行個體所產生的 GUID 的字串表示法<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a notification is received for any of the commands associated with this <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 通知收到任何與此相關聯的命令時，就會發生<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: OnChange occurs when the results for the associated command change.
trans-unit.target: 當相關聯的命令的結果變更時，就會發生 OnChange。

trans-unit.source: If you are not using OnChange, you can check the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.HasChanges%2A> property to determine whether the query results have changed.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未使用 OnChange，您可以檢查<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.HasChanges%2A>屬性來判斷是否已變更的查詢結果。</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.HasChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OnChange event does not necessarily imply a change in the data.
trans-unit.target: OnChange 事件不一定表示會在資料中的變更。

trans-unit.source: Other circumstances, such as time-out expired and failure to set the notification request, also generate OnChange.
trans-unit.target: 其他情況下，例如逾時過期，而且無法設定通知要求，也會產生 OnChange。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Starts the listener for receiving dependency change notifications from the instance of SQL Server specified by the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 啟動接聽程式，用於接收從連接字串所指定的 SQL Server 執行個體的相依性變更通知。

trans-unit.source: This method starts the listener for the <xref:System.AppDomain> for receiving dependency notifications from the instance of [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] specified by the `connectionString` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此方法會啟動的接聽程式<xref:System.AppDomain>接收執行個體的相依性通知[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]所指定`connectionString`參數。</xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: This method may be called more than once with different connection strings for multiple servers.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法可能會一次以上不同的連接字串具有多部伺服器。

trans-unit.source: For additional remarks, see <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需其他備註，請參閱<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: The connection string for the instance of [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] from which to obtain change notifications.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體的連接字串[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]可取得變更的通知。

trans-unit.source: **true** if the listener initialized successfully; **false** if a compatible listener already exists.
trans-unit.target: **true**如果接聽程式初始化成功。**false**如果相容的接聽程式已存在。

trans-unit.source: The connectionString parameter is NULL.
trans-unit.target: connectionString 參數為 NULL。

trans-unit.source: The connectionString parameter is the same as a previous call to this method, but the parameters are different.
trans-unit.target: connectionString 參數等同於先前呼叫這個方法，但不同參數。

trans-unit.source: The method was called from within the CLR.
trans-unit.target: 從 CLR 內呼叫此方法。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientPermission"></xref> code access security (CAS) permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientPermission"></xref>程式碼存取安全性 (CAS) 權限。

trans-unit.source: A subsequent call to the method has been made with an equivalent connectionString parameter with a different user, or a user that does not default to the same schema.
trans-unit.target: 方法的後續呼叫已具有對等項目 connectionString 具有不同的使用者或使用者，不會和相同的結構描述預設參數。

trans-unit.source: Also, any underlying **SqlClient** exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 此外，任何基礎**SqlClient**例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Starts the listener for receiving dependency change notifications from the instance of SQL Server specified by the connection string using the specified SQL Server Service Broker queue.
trans-unit.target: 啟動接聽程式，使用指定的 SQL Server Service Broker 佇列的連接字串所指定的 SQL Server 執行個體從接收相依性變更通知。

trans-unit.source: This method starts the listener for the <xref:System.AppDomain> for receiving dependency notifications from the instance of SQL Server specified by the `connectionString` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此方法會啟動的接聽程式<xref:System.AppDomain>接收從所指定的 SQL Server 執行個體的相依性通知`connectionString`參數。</xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: This method may be called more than once with different connection strings for multiple servers.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法可能會一次以上不同的連接字串具有多部伺服器。

trans-unit.source: If no queue name is specified, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> creates a temporary queue and service in the server that is used for the entire process, even if the process involves more than one <xref:System.AppDomain>.
trans-unit.target: 如果未不指定任何佇列名稱，則<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>會建立暫存佇列和服務中使用之伺服器的整個程序中，即使程序包含一個以上的<xref:System.AppDomain>.</xref:System.AppDomain> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>

trans-unit.source: The queue and service are automatically removed upon application shutdown.
trans-unit.target: 佇列和服務會自動在應用程式關閉時移除。

trans-unit.source: For additional remarks, see <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需其他備註，請參閱<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: The connection string for the instance of SQL Server from which to obtain change notifications.
trans-unit.target: 要從其中取得 SQL Server 的執行個體的連接字串變更通知。

trans-unit.source: An existing SQL Server Service Broker queue to be used.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用現有的 SQL Server Service Broker 佇列。

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the default queue is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，會使用預設佇列。

trans-unit.source: **true** if the listener initialized successfully; **false** if a compatible listener already exists.
trans-unit.target: **true**如果接聽程式初始化成功。**false**如果相容的接聽程式已存在。

trans-unit.source: The connectionString parameter is NULL.
trans-unit.target: connectionString 參數為 NULL。

trans-unit.source: The connectionString parameter is the same as a previous call to this method, but the parameters are different.
trans-unit.target: connectionString 參數等同於先前呼叫這個方法，但不同參數。

trans-unit.source: The method was called from within the CLR.
trans-unit.target: 從 CLR 內呼叫此方法。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientPermission"></xref> code access security (CAS) permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientPermission"></xref>程式碼存取安全性 (CAS) 權限。

trans-unit.source: A subsequent call to the method has been made with an equivalent connectionString parameter but a different user, or a user that does not default to the same schema.
trans-unit.target: 方法的後續呼叫已具有對等項目 connectionString 參數，但不同的使用者或不會預設為相同的結構描述的使用者。

trans-unit.source: Also, any underlying **SqlClient** exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 此外，任何基礎**SqlClient**例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Stops a listener for a connection specified in a previous <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start*> call.
trans-unit.target: 停止連線中先前指定的接聽程式<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start*>呼叫。</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Stop%2A> method must be called for each <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Stop%2A>方法必須針對每個呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A>呼叫。</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Stop%2A>

trans-unit.source: A given listener only shuts down fully when it receives the same number of <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Stop%2A> requests as <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A> requests.
trans-unit.target: 指定的接聽程式只關閉完全當它收到相同數目的<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Stop%2A>形式要求<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A>要求。</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Stop%2A>

trans-unit.source: Connection string for the instance of SQL Server that was used in a previous <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start*> call.
trans-unit.target: 已用於先前的 SQL Server 執行個體的連接字串<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start*>呼叫。</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start*>

trans-unit.source: **true** if the listener was completely stopped; **false** if the <xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref> was unbound from the listener, but there are is at least one other <xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref> using the same listener.
trans-unit.target: **true**如果接聽程式已完全停止。**false**如果<xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref>已解除繫結與接聽程式，但有是至少一個其他<xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref>使用相同的接聽程式。

trans-unit.source: The connectionString parameter is NULL.
trans-unit.target: connectionString 參數為 NULL。

trans-unit.source: The method was called from within SQLCLR.
trans-unit.target: 從 SQLCLR 內呼叫此方法。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientPermission"></xref> code access security (CAS) permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientPermission"></xref>程式碼存取安全性 (CAS) 權限。

trans-unit.source: An underlying **SqlClient** exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 基礎**SqlClient**發生例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Stops a listener for a connection specified in a previous <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start*> call.
trans-unit.target: 停止連線中先前指定的接聽程式<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start*>呼叫。</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Stop%2A> method must be called for each <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Stop%2A>方法必須針對每個呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A>呼叫。</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Stop%2A>

trans-unit.source: A given listener only shuts down fully when it receives the same number of <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Stop%2A> requests as <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A> requests.
trans-unit.target: 指定的接聽程式只關閉完全當它收到相同數目的<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Stop%2A>形式要求<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A>要求。</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Stop%2A>

trans-unit.source: Connection string for the instance of SQL Server that was used in a previous <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start*> call.
trans-unit.target: 已用於先前的 SQL Server 執行個體的連接字串<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start*>呼叫。</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start*>

trans-unit.source: The SQL Server Service Broker queue that was used in a previous <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start*> call.
trans-unit.target: 已用於先前的 SQL Server Service Broker 佇列<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start*>呼叫。</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start*>

trans-unit.source: **true** if the listener was completely stopped; **false** if the <xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref> was unbound from the listener, but there is at least one other <xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref> using the same listener.
trans-unit.target: **true**如果接聽程式已完全停止。**false**如果<xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref>未繫結與接聽程式，但沒有至少一個其他<xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref>使用相同的接聽程式。

trans-unit.source: The connectionString parameter is NULL.
trans-unit.target: connectionString 參數為 NULL。

trans-unit.source: The method was called from within SQLCLR.
trans-unit.target: 從 SQLCLR 內呼叫此方法。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientPermission"></xref> code access security (CAS) permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientPermission"></xref>程式碼存取安全性 (CAS) 權限。

trans-unit.source: And underlying **SqlClient** exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 和基礎**SqlClient**發生例外狀況。
